website_summaries.verdict: Customers seeking a set of zippered, cotton pillowcases will find their match in these comfortable covers.
pros: A great buy for those wanting a stylish, clean look
Users were shocked by the quality of the product compared with the inexpensive price
cons: The zipper and the seams may have trouble withstanding multiple washings

customer_reviews.title: Better than expected
customer_reviews.text: I haven't bought linens in a long time and didn't do much research. These had good ratings and prices, so I got them. I didn't realize that they made and that I needed waterproof protectors. I have night sweats and despite these not being waterproof, they hold up very well. My pillowcases are soaked thru and these have kept my pillows dry. I guess that I lucked out. Good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Don

customer_reviews.title: Perfect for me
customer_reviews.text: Very pleased...no problems with the zipper...I carefully placed pillows inside...good cover for my down pillow, hopefully feathers don't poke through any more. I love the striped feel of the cotton as well...like hotel style
customer_reviews.author: shannon pruett

customer_reviews.title: I love those pillow cases
customer_reviews.text: I love those pillow cases! They are smooth and look and feel like satin. I am a;most tempted to use them as "normal" pillow cases
customer_reviews.author: EstherSylvia Firlej-Perisin

customer_reviews.title: This is a terrific buy.
customer_reviews.text: All my pillows are 100% down...wouldn't use anything else. The high thread count makes it virtually impossible for anything to pop out of your feather or down pillows. These are to be used over your pillow and under your decorative pillow cases. Although the ad says it's a 'Standard' size, it's actually two inches longer than standard. Close to a Queen size,
customer_reviews.author: thebonz0

customer_reviews.title: Fabric feels nice but made poorly
customer_reviews.text: Based on the reviews, this product looked solid. The price seemed reasonable. When we received the package, we're happy to find that the fabric felt great against our skin and on our pillows. But that's where the good ended. After washing it once, the zippers came apart, and there was no way to connect them back. Having zippers on the pillow protectors was an important reason why we decided to purchase these items. We discovered this quality control issuet too late, and now we can't return them or request a refund. Buyer Beware!
customer_reviews.author: lawrence

customer_reviews.title: Don't get these. They only lasted a few weeks.
customer_reviews.text: One of the pillowcases fell apart within weeks and the zipper broke on another.
customer_reviews.author: Katherine

customer_reviews.title: Seams ripping
customer_reviews.text: I have had these pillow cases for a month and they are already ripping at the seams. Very cheap. Do not buy
customer_reviews.author: Jan Brady

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: They were not all made of the same material. One had a different pattern.
customer_reviews.author: theresa shaw

customer_reviews.title: Definitely NOT 100% Cotton
customer_reviews.text: This fabric is slippery and awful. Definitely NOT NOT NOT 100% cotton. I thought textiles sold in the US were required to have labels that show the % content of each fiber element. These just say "cotton". Cotton may be one component, but definitely not the only one.
customer_reviews.author: B. Roberts

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality control - 1 of the 4 cases had ...
customer_reviews.text: Poor quality control - 1 of the 4 cases had a 2 inch rip on the zipper seam. Based on other reviews I had read, I looked at each case closely when they arrived to see if I had the same issue others had experienced. I did and sent them back. My advice - if you buy this product inspect them closely before you wash them.
customer_reviews.author: Christopher Wells

customer_reviews.title: One Star
customer_reviews.text: Smaller then standard pillow, one cover had a hole in it, very disappointing
customer_reviews.author: jeffrey c.

customer_reviews.title: Very good quality at a bargain price!
customer_reviews.text: These are a really nice weight cotton and seem well made. I washed and dried them to get rid of any starch/sizing products. (I always do this). They came out of the drier with very little (if any) shrinkage. They are generously sized and fit my pillows comfortably. I just received them so can't vouch for their durability but I think they will hold up well. They are an incredible bargain. I would buy them again and highly recommend them!
customer_reviews.author: Raynepa

customer_reviews.title: Zippers broke on every one.
customer_reviews.text: These fell apart as soon as they were washed. They were comfortable, but were not sealed and are not waterproof. I would not recommend.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Gorgeous... But Careful With Size!
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought the package of 4 standard size with zippers. They are actually too small for my standard size pillows. I reordered the queen and they're perfect. The are very well made and look much more pricey than they are. They have a nice tonal stripe and the fabrication is so nice that I'm using 2 of them as shams. They are that nice. So just be careful when ordering regarding the size. I know these are just normal standard pillows, so not sure what the deal is. I love the look of these and I highly recommend.
customer_reviews.author: ju

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for good price
customer_reviews.text: Fits well, good price 10/1/18 Update: these cases work great on my husband's pillows. He's not able to twist these off the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Katie K.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality
customer_reviews.text: Always need more pillow protectors since they seem to disappear all the time. These are very nice. You can also use them to hold keepsake quilts to keep them from getting dusty and keep them nicely folded up.
customer_reviews.author: Connie Wheeler

customer_reviews.title: Mild odor like Petroleum
customer_reviews.text: I don't think these are cotton despite the claim. They have a petroleum odor. There is a label inside with washing info. and made in Pakistan but nowhere is there a label indicating the material which is really strange. I am returning.
customer_reviews.author: Friend

customer_reviews.title: They Do The Trick!
customer_reviews.text: I just needed an extra layer of protection for my pillows since I tend to head sweat at night. These work great. I've used them for a week and so far am pleased. I wasn't looking for complete waterproof, so I can't really speak to that. I expect these will last a long time and will hold up to frequent washing.
customer_reviews.author: David Tomb

customer_reviews.title: Acceptable
customer_reviews.text: I looked for pillow covers for a long time and finally realized a perfect product doesn’t exist. And these definitely aren’t perfect...but they meet my needs just fine. They’re not high quality but I’ve washed them four times and nothing has ripped/broken and the fabric doesn’t bother me under my pillowcases.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsay

customer_reviews.title: Soft and fresh
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with these pillow protectors, very roomy for even puffy pillows..have been looking in stores for these for 6 months..I was afraid to order on line without touching the texture of fabric...just washed and put them on my pillows.. no wrinkles, soft, fresh and clean feeling..I wish they would make sheet sets of this fabric and no more staining my pillows with eyeliner from my eyes. Yippee...and pillows will be preserved from yellowing sweat stains..LOVE,LOVE,LOVE THEM!!!
customer_reviews.author: michelina Leone

customer_reviews.title: GREAT VALUE FOR 4-PACK. TRUE 20x30 QUEEN SIZE!!!
customer_reviews.text: **FOLLOW UP DEC 20 2019: I HAVE THESE SINCE NOV 11 2019. TODAY I WAS CHANGING MY BED AND DISCOVERED THAT THE SEAM ON THE 30" SIDE IS OPEN AND FRAYING NEARLY 3/4 OF THE WAY ON 1 PROTECTOR!!! THESE SAY THEY ARE HOTEL QUALITY? WAITING FOR A REPLY FROM SELLER/NIAGARA.** I BOUGHT FOR QUEEN SIZE PILLOWS, TRUE TO SIZE QUEEN IS 20 X 30 AND THESE ARE USED ON PILLOWS WITH 2" BAFFLE!!! I AM BACK TO ORDER REPLACEMENTS FOR MY OTHER PILLOWS.**UPDATE: WAITING OF ORDERING FOR MY STD SIZE PILLOWS FOR VENDOR TO RESOLVE PROBLEM WITH QUEEN SIZE PROBLEM.
customer_reviews.author: MAGICARPET

customer_reviews.title: Quality Appearance
customer_reviews.text: I opened these today & liked the quality of these so threw them in my load of laundry. When I took them out & went to use them one of them was missing the zipper tab. So that was disappointing. Not sure if it was shipped like this or it happened in the washer/dryer. I’m going to watch if they hold up well or if this an indication of what I can expect. I’d love to order more if I don’t have any additional issues.
customer_reviews.author: Jayne's Addiction

customer_reviews.title: Rough and scratchy
customer_reviews.text: First I gave them a 2 be ause they do seem to block allergens. However this is one of those products that really makes be question the validity of reviews. They are not soft or comfortable in anyway. They are wrinkle free but that's all. I washed them before using and that helped a little but they are so scratchy and just feel rough. I have pretty soft hands but when I rub my hand across them you can feel the material catch. I would not buy these again.
customer_reviews.author: HAILEE

customer_reviews.title: Good quality for the money
customer_reviews.text: UPDATE: I have had these protectors for a while, they are holding up nicely so I decided to purchase another set to take to our Florida home. SO that means I am really happy with these!! I found these pillow covers to be much better than expected!! I washed them all, they come out nice and soft, I am pleased with my purchase. They are of good quality, zippers work fine, the fabric is of good quality. I would recommend them to my family, therefore I recommend them to shoppers.
customer_reviews.author: Ladybugm

customer_reviews.title: Excellent 100% cotton weighty pillow covers. Order these!!!!
customer_reviews.text: These pillow case covers are about as nice as a high priced pillowcase-they honestly feel weighty , and it’s like they are a 1400+ thread count . Feel like our luxury linens and that cost is about 20x for each pillowcase. 100% cotton . Ships fast-very nice! Will definitely buy agsin and I encourage anyone poking for pillow covers to go with these. HIGHLY recommend!
customer_reviews.author: T

customer_reviews.title: Zippers get stuck and break
customer_reviews.text: These are soft but the zippers are cheaply made and awful! The get stuck constantly- I’ve had to use pliers on a couple and almost had to cut one off today because the zipper wouldn’t budge.
customer_reviews.author: ErinC

customer_reviews.title: Not even close to being 100% cotton; FALSE ADVERTISING
customer_reviews.text: These are BARELY cotton, at best they may be 20% cotton; but since NONE of the packaging or sewn-on product labels tell you what they're made of, there's no recourse for false advertising. I grew up in the household of a professional seamstress and I know my fabrics. They are nylon/polyester that snags even when you run a dry hand over it. The best thing I can say is the fabric is thick and no wrinkles (due to the lack of cotton fibers), and the zippers work smoothly. I'm in a bind and am stuck with them.
customer_reviews.author: JuJuJules

customer_reviews.title: Some not so good
customer_reviews.text: I’ve had these for just over a month they’ve been washed twice and two of them are already ripping at the seams and on one the zipper is stuck. I bought two packs of four. So the first 4 a fine. But in the second package of 4 three are already unusable. Bummer
customer_reviews.author: lesa

customer_reviews.title: Short time use only
customer_reviews.text: These start out great but do not hold up well and pill terribly. After 6 months of use I’m replacing them.
customer_reviews.author: Jodi

customer_reviews.title: Poor quality material nd workmanship
customer_reviews.text: I had to wait a long time to receive these cases. Regardless, they are cheaply made - no way the thread count advertised. The quality of cotton is thin but rough which makes it difficult to slide into a pillow case.
customer_reviews.author: Nonna

customer_reviews.title: Great price but not very soft.
customer_reviews.text: I don't think I'd buy these again bc they really don't feel like they are 100% cotton. The label says they are but they feel like a poly-blend to me. But what do you expect for this price? They were practically free. In the future, I'll stick with the cotton pillow covers from Macy's Charter Club.
customer_reviews.author: Kim M.

customer_reviews.title: Frayed before using
customer_reviews.text: These are such poor quality that TWO of them started to fray at the seams BEFORE I EVEN USED THEM. One wash and two of the pillow covers are unusable, literally unable to serve their only purpose, which is to protect the pillow.
customer_reviews.author: cgm

customer_reviews.title: made so well
customer_reviews.text: made so well, can't beat the price, 4 for 15.00, unbelievable. I ordered another set and eventually will order more for all my pillows in my house. I have some really nice but older feather pillows that are not so pretty to look at, with this pillow protector it is like all my pillows are new. they are made so well, I luv the stripped look also, looks expensive. I really recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Mary

customer_reviews.title: I would give it 5 stars but...
customer_reviews.text: one of my pillow covers slipped passed quality control and was ripped along the seam...after the first order of them was lost in transit and finally getting these, I'm just going to use it anyway. I am happy with the material and think they will work for what I want and since it's been such an ordeal to finally get them, I'm not going to return them. I'll just put the cover on the pillow and then a pillow case over it...it should suffice.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: No zipper opener!
customer_reviews.text: Giving a 3 as one came with no zipper opener, so I am unable to use it!
customer_reviews.author: sd

customer_reviews.title: Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: These fit my queen sized big pillows perfectly. Since the pillows are expensive, (bought with a new mattress) I wanted a quality pillow cover because my husband has night sweats. Price was great and the quality of fabric and stitching is great.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: great find!
customer_reviews.text: Really nice pillow protectors. I was tired of all of the cheap and mismatched pillow protectors in my house. (I know, first world problems!) It's so satisfying that they all match now. The weave is tight and the material is pre-shrunk, so they hold their shape well in the wash. I would have preferred a nylon zipper pull instead of the metal, but it's hardly an issue.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pillow protectors
customer_reviews.text: First time putting the cover on the zipper broke. I had no time to return and/or it's too big of a hassle to do so. Not happy that the zipper broke the first time I tried to zip it up!!! Oh well
customer_reviews.author: Betty Lou Rohner

customer_reviews.title: 75% wonderful
customer_reviews.text: And one in four split its zipper on first use.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Wouldn’t purchase again
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for with these. They feel cheap and more like plastic than cotton. They’re probably better for decorative pillows than pillows you’re planning on sleeping with.
customer_reviews.author: Nicole

customer_reviews.title: Protects my new pillow...
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to protect our new pillows which cost me more than I've ever paid for pillows. These covers fit perfect over our new pillows and keeps them in new condition. They are soft and are hypoallergenic. The package comes with 4 pillow cases. We're happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Ray Maldonado

customer_reviews.title: A must have
customer_reviews.text: Very nice product. Well made, very soft. Managing AirBnB's I had to have protection on the pillows. These fit the bill.
customer_reviews.author: White in Florida

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic for the price. Absolutely Highly Recommend this Product
customer_reviews.text: I had ordered 4 separate sets, and no sooner did I open and use one pack I knew I wanted to order more. They have a soft satin sheen, and really are too good to be used as a pillow protector. So I put one on as a pillow protector, and the put another one on as a pillow case. Much nicer and better quality than normal white pillow cases and MUCH CHEAPER in price.
customer_reviews.author: Gaby S

customer_reviews.title: Poorly made-money wasted
customer_reviews.text: The material is thin, and the zippers are so cheap they come apart after washing. Overall these are made with cheap material and really cheap zippers, even though around $17.00 for 4 is inexpensive, you do get what you pay for on this purchase. My advice spend a little more it will be worth it, I know I will.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah M.

customer_reviews.title: Already fraying
customer_reviews.text: Fabric is nice and the extra room in the king size is nice. The stitching and quality control is a bit shoddy, though. The first one I pulled out of the package was already fraying and the seam was coming apart. The other three look okay for now. Update: I washed them on a gentle cycle and one seam in a second pillowcase came apart. Knocking a star off my review for that.
customer_reviews.author: EP

customer_reviews.title: Best Pillow Case Covers!
customer_reviews.text: These pillow case covers are great! Very good quality for the price, wash well, they look so nice you don’t even want to put a pillow case over them! They fit well with a little space on our Jumbo and Queen size pillows. I spent more on other pillow cases through Groupon that were rough, zipper already split, and one came with a tiny hole. Go with Amazon and order these... I just ordered a second batch!
customer_reviews.author: Aguilar Family

customer_reviews.title: these are great! (4 pack 20 x 30 queen, 8541812111)
customer_reviews.text: I washed/dried them immediately and have had zero issues with the zippers as some have stated. They are ample size and a thick, nice looking, striped fabric. No, it's not a soft fabric, but these are pillow protectors not pillow cases. I'm pleased with them and just bought another set.
customer_reviews.author: perelandra

customer_reviews.title: Greatest pillow covers ever
customer_reviews.text: I bought these for our "my pillows" and they work great. Have washed them many times and they still look new. They make it really easy to put other pillow cases over them because they are "slippery - shiny". We liked them so much that I bought them for all of our pillows, and then bought a set for my daughter as well. Love the zipper closure.
customer_reviews.author: apeterse31

customer_reviews.title: Zipper Broke First Time Using
customer_reviews.text: Needed these pillow covers (4) for the guest room. With company arriving, I put them on the guest pillows and the second one in, the zipper broke as I was closing it. Not very pleased. Obviously quality is an issue. Not sure what will happen when I wash them. Fingers Crossed. If I hadn't needed to use them, I would have boxed them back up and returned them to the seller.
customer_reviews.author: Darrin B.

customer_reviews.title: must have for allergy sufferers
customer_reviews.text: These 4 pack pillow case covers work great. High quality product, this is perfect for someone that has allergies or Asthma. My son has asthma and these have been a incredible find to help him to reduce the allergens that cause his asthma to act up during the night. I highly recommend these quality pillow cases.
customer_reviews.author: Samantha Redman

customer_reviews.title: Maybe for spare bedrooms?
customer_reviews.text: Zippers are not good quality, I had one break before even putting it on a pillow. I would probably try it without the zipper because they are comfy
customer_reviews.author: Whitney

customer_reviews.title: Excellent choice for a pillow
customer_reviews.text: my husband and I needed to replace our pillows. We loved what we had but couldn’t even remember brand, etc. I bought these after reading the reviews. They are everything that is advertised. I received lots of info even prior to receiving the pillows. We had them for a couple of months and highly recommend if you like softness and firmness. But, as the literature tells you, you can remove some of the filling to change the loft. Great pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Laura Godfrey

customer_reviews.title: poor quality, right from the package
customer_reviews.text: These pillow protectors feel like poor quality. I was planning to give them a try, but there is a gaping tear along the seam in one of them, fresh from the package- not even used yet. Clearly there is poor quality control or a product inspection prior to mailing to a paying customer. I'm returning and searching for something better
customer_reviews.author: Taylors

customer_reviews.title: Poor stitching
customer_reviews.text: One wash (cold, gentle cycle - tumble dry low) and it's already coming apart at the seam. Super disappointing. *Updated* two of the pillowcases had this issue. Really disappointed that they didn't even make it onto my pillows before that were coming apart.
customer_reviews.author: Meghan Weaver

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: I bought these to replace my old worn out pillow covers. I received 4 covers in 1 pack. That in itself is a good value. They are a nice size. seemingly well made-I will be washing them before use-will update if there is anything amiss. Bu they seem nice, good quality, sturdy. Hard not to like them.
customer_reviews.author: Foothill Woman

customer_reviews.title: Pillowcases SLIDE over these.
customer_reviews.text: These are very stiff and somewhat slick. My pillowcases slide around over them terribly. Every single time I use the pillow, I have to re-orient the seam from the middle of the flat side back to the edge. Extremely annoying and very sloppy looking. Really makes it hard to relax on the pillow with the case sliding around so badly.
customer_reviews.author: Anna

customer_reviews.title: Loved them when I got them but now....
customer_reviews.text: We've had these a couple of months now, and wash them weekly. These cannot take that. The seams have failed completely and just frayed such that I can't even re-sew them to keep using. We used standard sized pillows and they weren't 'crammed' into the case. Very disappointed!
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Great for Queen Size Goose Down Pillows
customer_reviews.text: The previous protectors I purchased for these pillows had a terry cloth outter fabric that made it very difficult to slide into pillow cases and it also retained heat, causing sweating. Have had no problems with these protectors. Cases slide on easily, no night sweats, and it doesn't constrict the comfort of the pillows.
customer_reviews.author: Mixdplate

customer_reviews.title: Side seams broke within two months
customer_reviews.text: We used these for about two months, washed them twice, and at the end of the second wash the side seams had split. Pretty poor quality.
customer_reviews.author: nvish

customer_reviews.title: Zipper too short for the King size
customer_reviews.text: I loved the material. On the king size, the zippers run across the bottom of the pillowcase about 2/3 the length of the pillow. Both pillow protectors have ripped trying to squeeze and jam the pillows into the case. Ordered these mid May - this is the end of August and they are both in the garbage.
customer_reviews.author: Christine S

customer_reviews.title: Great Value!
customer_reviews.text: I needed many pillow protectors and the price was right for these. I held my breath that they would have quality. This product exceeded my expectations. They were well made and of quality fabric. I washed them before putting them on my pillows. They came out of the dryer wrinkle free and fit the pillows perfectly.
customer_reviews.author: Lyn B.

customer_reviews.title: Good thickness
customer_reviews.text: These pillow covers are as described. They seem to be well made, although I haven’t yet washed them. The material is thick and the texture is semi soft due to the striped pattern. However, Softness doesn’t matter so much to me since I will have a pillowcase over it. They are made in Pakistan, which I appreciate since too much is made in China.
customer_reviews.author: lic

customer_reviews.title: These are wonderful
customer_reviews.text: Kind of compresses my pillow, so the pillow stays firm, plus cootie-free. I wash them when I wash the rest of the linens and has held up well.
customer_reviews.author: AZ Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Pillow Covers
customer_reviews.text: Everyone should know that when you buy a new pillow you should always put a zippered cotton pillow cover over it so that it keeps your pillows nicer longer. Got these for my daughter with pillows and she was not gonna put pillowcases on them because they were so soft!!!! well I said NO - new pillows, new pillow covers now put on your pillow cases!!! Great product at a great price!!!
customer_reviews.author: Brian Rice

customer_reviews.title: They work
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for every pillow at a family cabin. I was amazed after a long summer when I expected to replace pillows for the next season that the pillows were pristine, no discoloration, no odors. And the protectors laundered well. The zippers are holding up as well. A definite good buy.
customer_reviews.author: Phyllis Schmidt

customer_reviews.title: Only so-so
customer_reviews.text: You get what you pay for. I bought the 4 pack standard in the gray color. The second one that I tried to put on the pillow ripped slightly at the zipper seam. Still usable, but I can see that after another washing it will probably more than likely come unraveled.
customer_reviews.author: S. Shuler

customer_reviews.title: Feels like a cotton/poly blend.
customer_reviews.text: Fabric feels hard. Not like 100% cotton. It has prevented down from being released from pillow.
customer_reviews.author: Axe Rider

customer_reviews.title: Zipper placement
customer_reviews.text: Love the product. EXCEPT as shown in pictures the zipper is on the end. It is not it’s actually 3 inches in on the one side. Which is a little uncomfortable if you happen to flip the pillow over. Other than that it’s soft and looks sleek
customer_reviews.author: Dawn T

customer_reviews.title: Falling apart after ONE wash.
customer_reviews.text: How do these have so many good reviews!? I received the pillow covers TODAY (8/19/20). Laundered then, according to the care instructions, TODAY. Three out of four of the pillow covers are already falling apart. The stitching to keep the end of the zipper together has come undone and multiple seams are popping. One of the zippers even has a small hole in it. I’m incredibly disappointed! I haven’t tried returning them yet due to the fact that I just got them today and I don’t know if I can, since I’ve washed them ONCE. I sure hope I can though, otherwise this was money down the toilet.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I ordered these to go on my Serta forever cool memory foam pillows because regular pillow cases would slide off the pillow during the night. These are excellent quality and fit the pillows perfectly. Very happy with them.
customer_reviews.author: Mary K. Taylor

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price.
customer_reviews.text: Decent for the price. I use for my dogs pillows and it's been about a month, no tears and washes fine. Maybe a little pilling but that's not an issue. The zippers are pretty cheap and that might be the only thing that I feel I have to be delicate with.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: Fabric Not Cotton
customer_reviews.text: These pillow protectors appear to be made well enough, however they are not cotton. They feel like polyester. Product description should be changed.
customer_reviews.author: MH

customer_reviews.title: Comfortable and durable
customer_reviews.text: Was not expecting the quality and durability at this price. I think these will survive for awhile even washing the pillow cover every couple weeks. Haven't noticed any issue when it comes to my dust allergy flaring up from these.
customer_reviews.author: John Littrel

customer_reviews.title: These are the ones to order.
customer_reviews.text: What a bargain. These are really nice. I highly recommend. It brings expensive pillows back to life. I highly recommend these.
customer_reviews.author: Dean K.

customer_reviews.title: I liked the feeling of material but to thin.
customer_reviews.text: I lived the feel of the cases. Cool to sleep on. Washed and dried low. When putting on the cases one zipper broke. Another case had a small finger like Rip, maybe my finger when putting on the pillow it could of been made. I threw them out. I guess I was disappointed after washing.
customer_reviews.author: Elaine DeLuca

customer_reviews.title: Comfy but defective
customer_reviews.text: These were nice soft covers and perfect for my pillows in the family room. However, the zippers broke on all four of them after they were washed once. Very disappointed,
customer_reviews.author: Vicktorya Kopf

customer_reviews.title: Great purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Love these they are exactly what I was hoping for. I ordered some not looking at what fabric it was made from , bad choice they were hot and noisy . I ordered these hoping to have made the right fabric choice and I love,love,love them . All cotton wrinkle free , soft very nice. I will be purchasing more
customer_reviews.author: valerie kast

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I was worried when I read the reviews and saw the pictures I almost didn't purchase these. So when they arrived I looked at each one the seams and zippers did not arrive with any defects. So I washed them with the zippers closed and did not put in the dryer they air dried quickly with no wrinkles and am very happy with them
customer_reviews.author: Nancy

customer_reviews.title: Nice Pretty covers
customer_reviews.text: I love these covers for my pillows. They look like good quality and are soft and attractive. I was able to salvage my favorite pillow by covering it with one of these before putting a pillowcase over it. I will be getting more.

customer_reviews.author: wrj, Owings Mills, MD   This is an addendum to an earlier review of my recent purchase of the All-Clad stainless steel kettle.  I've noticed there are several negative comments about this kettle, such as white flecks in the water, to a filmy discoloration on the interior of the kettle.  After daily use, my interior is as shiny as when I first bought it.  One thing though, I use bottled water.  I find that I don't get like scale on my pots, this kettle, my clothes iron or my drip coffeemaker.  I'm thinking that the reported white flecks in poured water could be that scale flaking off the inside surface. Distilled white vinegar can help eliminate limescale buildup.  As for residue on the outside, I remove my kettle from the stove before frying/sauteeing to avoid free radicals from settling on my kettle. Just a thought.
